entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
